Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

package it.polimi.ingsw.controller
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw
     
  • Class
    Description
    ActionController
    ActionController is the controller class that modify the model after an action request has been received by a client who is the active player.
    ActionPhaseOrder
    ActionPhaseOrder is a strategy for the order of play calculation that is used to calculate the order at the beginning of a new Action Phase.
    CharacterController
    CharacterController handles a character action request by controlling if the input is correct and, if so, it constructs the input that will be given to requested character in the model package and call the corresponding method.
    GameController
    GameController is the main class of the controller package that handles all actions that a client request by calling other controllers (TurnController and ActionController) methods.
    InitController
    Class InitController is used for initialize the game and all its components
    PhaseOrder
    PhaseOrder uses a Strategy pattern to calculate the current RoundPhase order.
    PlanningPhaseOrder
    PlanningPhaseOrder is a strategy for the order of play calculation that is used to calculate the order at the beginning of a new Planning Phase.
    RoundPhase
    Enum class RoundPhase contains all possible phases of the round, each phase has a list of actions that can be done during it.
    TurnController
    Class TurnController is used to maintain the order of play during the turn.
    TurnPhase
    Enum Class TurnPhase contains all possible states of a round.
